definition: to arouse hostility or indifference in where there had formerly been love, affection, or friendliness
details:
verb
- to arouse hostility or indifference in where there had formerly been love, affection, or friendliness
= example: to arouse hostility or indifference in where there had formerly been love, affection, or friendliness
= synonyms: alien
- to make withdrawn or isolated or emotionally dissociated
= example: to make withdrawn or isolated or emotionally dissociated
- to transfer property or ownership
= example: to transfer property or ownership
= synonyms: alien
